title: General Knowledge
description: If you have knowledge, let others light their candles in it.A bird doesn't sing because it has an answer, it sings because it has a song. We are not what we know but what we are willing to learn.

title: Poems and Stories
description: Poem is thoughts that breathe, and words that burn. After nourishment, shelter and companionship, stories are the thing we need most in the world.
